body: The sponsor places you in charge of an existing domain within his own already-settled lands. If it includes already improved terrain and cities, you're expected to govern and further improve them. (While you'll start with land and settlements, you'll still need around 50 BP to handle your kingdom's Consumption and development needs.)
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Building/Build Points/Wealthy Sponsor/Fief
name: Fief
